storyName: My Life I Gave for You
storyInfo: As the statue collapses in the fire, fingers are pointed at the Sarkaz present.

attributes.content: Fire devours all indiscriminately.
One fire can destroy everything, no matter how precious, no matter how treasured.
Gerald once said the Sarkaz have no home, only war that follows them wherever they go. They swore fealty to their lord in the hope of finding a home of their own.
He left because he became disappointed.
I did not dare to ask why he was disappointed.
We were full of hope when we first came here.
We were happy despite the hardship.
But now...
Now, they are leaving. Is it because life here has disappointed him in the same way?
What about me?
I am watching the things I treasured burn before my eyes.
Burning.
Fading away.
Gone... all gone...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Fire! Fire!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: The sacrarium is burning! Get water! Water!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: What's going on? Is that a fire?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Raimund! What are you doing here? I thought you had...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Now's not the time for that!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Y-You're right!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: The sacrarium's on fire! Give me a hand!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: The sacrarium?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: How did the sacrarium catch fire?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: How should I know?! Fires have happened before, but nothing as bad as this one. And the timing!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: We need to put it out! Thank goodness it wasn't the residences...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Keep fighting the fire. I'll get help.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Water! *cough* More water!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: The fire's too fierce!
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Careful of the smoke! Close the door, that might keep the fire from spreading...
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: What are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: It's the sacrarium! The holy statue is in there! Closing the door won't put the fire out!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: That's not what I mean! But it's too dangerous right now!
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: A wise decision.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What do you know... who are you?
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: Kids...? No, how could you bring children to a dangerous place like this?!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: Stay away! It's not safe here!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: You're right. It's not safe.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You've inhaled a lot of smoke. Continue to do so, and you'll begin experiencing symptoms of smoke inhalation.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So what? Got anything useful to say?
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: I've never seen you before... you're Sankta, right? From Laterano? That's a holy statue of Laterano! Do something!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: My mission does not involve the statue.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Now's no time to talk about some 'mission'!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: Use your... your... your Arts to put that bloody fire out, or get out of the way if you're not gonna help!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: I'm afraid I'm unable to use Arts suitable for that purpose.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: More people are needed to fight the fire and minimize damage.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'll get help!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: There's no need.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: They're coming.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're here...
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: We got word from Raimund.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Enough talk. Take the bucket! I'll go get more!
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz

attributes.content: A-Alright!
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: More here!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I've got it.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Find a safe place to wait.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You're that Lateran...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: And what of the kids?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I do not believe now is the right time to discuss that.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Here, bucket.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Clément!
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Stop, Clément! Don't go any further!
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: I advise against going into the scene of the fire right now.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Let me go! Let me go!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: It is dangerous without proper protective equipment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He's right!
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Are you trying to get yourself killed?!
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: I have to—
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I have to...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Sorry... I lost my head.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I know it hurts, but this is serious.
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Flowers can be replanted.
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: We're running out of water. I'll fill a few more buckets.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: We can't go any further! The fire and smoke are too much...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You can stay behind.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I suggest not speaking loudly to avoid smoke inhalation.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: And who's the reason I have to speak?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You don't need to follow me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I don't trust you. I'm keeping an eye on you.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Wait, did you hear that?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: The fire continues to burn, and the gun-wielding statue creaks ominously.
It casts a scorching shadow on Raimund, as though passing judgment on the Sarkaz who dared to set foot in a Sankta sacrarium, as it begins to topple in the fire.
Get back!
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There is a sharp cracking sound, but the expected pain does not come.
The Executor stands before the Sarkaz, his gun held high.
This way, before anything else falls!
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Your arm...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: No, wait a second, you destroyed the statue?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I did not destroy it, only changed its direction to prevent it from hitting you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But it's your statue...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: That does not matter.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The fire continues to grow. It's atypical.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Although furnishings like wooden benches are flammable, the initial location of the fire was unusual. It's possible that something else caused the fire.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What do you mean? What are you trying to say?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That is...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: (Is this where the Sarkaz live?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (The walls are too thin to guard against the winds blowing across the wastes.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (It really is chilly.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (It's getting dark. I'm taking too long.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Hm?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Is that a fire I see up there?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (A fire, now?)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Looks like there's trouble on Federico's side.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (...! Someone's coming!)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: They've gone to help at the abbey. Should we go too?
attributes.name: Concerned Sarkaz

attributes.content: Stefano was good to us. Even if we're leaving...
attributes.name: Concerned Sarkaz

attributes.content: You go if you want to, but keep me out of this!
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: They've got their Lateran friends! Let them help. We're not welcome there.
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: (Well, guess I just got into the habit of hiding myself.)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: (Was there an argument? Things weren't like this when Oren and I first came...)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Don't be mad. Leyla didn't mean to say that...
attributes.name: Concerned Sarkaz

attributes.content: She definitely thought it, even if she didn't mean to say it!
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: She said I stole her winter clothes! Me, a thief? Taking care of this stuff has been my responsibility for years!
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: Man...
attributes.name: Concerned Sarkaz

attributes.content: She thinks we're an eyesore! They all think so! They never treated us the same as them!
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: They hate us because Stefano refused to abandon us and return to Laterano! I see them for who they are now. We're the only ones who thought of us as family!
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: I hesitated when Gerald wanted to leave. Now, I realize he was right.
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: They want us gone? We'll be gone!
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: Can we really get out of here, though? The scouts haven't come back...
attributes.name: Concerned Sarkaz

attributes.content: Still better than waiting. Next time this happens, I won't be able to stop myself from punching someone.
attributes.name: Angry Sarkaz

attributes.content: It's cold.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I spent so much time holed up in a room that I forgot how cold the night outside was.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Velliv is going to cut my pay for this.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I guess I'll make my own shining fruit dobosh for Mostima rather than buy it if that happens.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Time is running out...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: —Found you!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's finally out...
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Everything is gone, but at least the fire didn't spread below. It could've been worse.
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'it could've been worse'?!
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Look at the statue! And the flowers... oh.
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: No one was hurt. That's a good thing.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: What about you, Raimund?
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz

attributes.content: Fine. Not dead yet.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You crazy kid, you really charged straight in!
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz

attributes.content: Just you wait, Gerald will smack you around when he hears about this!
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz

attributes.content: Don't tell Gerald.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Ha, now you're scared.
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz

attributes.content: Where's the Abbot? Did anyone tell him?
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: Well, informing him is about all we can do right now.
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: Everybody be careful. We don't want any more accidents...
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: It wasn't an accident.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Federico!
attributes.name: Estara & Erendel

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Calm Inhabitant

attributes.content: It wasn't an accident. I believe this was an act of arson.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That's not something to say lightly, Lateran.
attributes.name: Cautious Sarkaz Inhabitant

attributes.content: Impossible... who would want to burn the sacrarium down?
attributes.name: Anxious Inhabitant

attributes.content: Do you have proof?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Like I said.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: The fire spread in an unusual way. It was caused by a foreign source.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That's all?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Enough to reach a conclusion.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Why you—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Wait a second, Raimund.
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: What? You think this is arson too?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I... I don't know. But...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: I went to look for help. People don't hang around this place much, especially you Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: But I bumped into you.
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Hey, what are you getting at?!
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz

attributes.content: Don't interrupt, Fernand!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Let him finish.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I... I don't mean... I just wanted to ask...
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: What were you doing there, Raimund?
attributes.name: Panicked Inhabitant

attributes.content: Is this what you wanted to show me, Gerald?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: People don't say what's really on their minds around us.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: This is our reality, Stefano.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I know. I've always known.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: No one is wrong. This isn't anyone's fault. We just want to live in peace. But this is how things are.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are doomed to wander.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I told you this place would be your home.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: You did.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You said you wanted the children to take root here.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Maybe I was wrong.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You said no one is wrong.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: There's a lot on your mind lately, Stefano.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: What are you planning?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Or, should I ask...? Did you have anything to do with this fire?
attributes.name: Gerald
